description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+27 vs AC; 1d8+14 (1d8+20 against a bloodied target)(crit 5d6+22, or 5d6+27 against a bloodied target).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+26 vs AC; 1d4+13 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Ranged 5/10

+26 vs AC; 1d4+13 damage.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic, Weapon

Standard

Jarlaxle makes one rapier attack and one dagger melee attack. If both attacks hit the same target, that target is dazed until the end of Jarlaxle's next turn.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Weapon

Standard

+27 vs Reflex; 3d8+14 damage, and the target drops one weapon it is holding. It lands in a square of Jarlaxle's choice up to 6 squares away.

Encounter ✦ Radiant

Minor, Encounter

Ranged 10

+24 vs Reflex; until the end of Jarlaxle's next turn, the target grants combat advantage to all attacks, and the target cannot benefit from invisibility or concealment.

Encounter

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 1

This power creates a zone of darkness that remains in place until the end of Jarlaxle's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except Jarlaxle. Any creature entirely within the area (except Jarlaxle) is blinded.

Daily ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When hit by an attack, daily

Jarlaxle teleports up to 5 squares, and until the end of his next turn, he gains combat advantage against the attacker. Jarlaxle takes half damage from that attack.

Encounter

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When hit by a melee attack

Jarlaxle shifts up to 6 squares.

system.biography:
HP 392; Bloodied 196Init +21 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 39Fort 34Ref 38Will 35
Speed 8
Ability ScoresStr 16 (+13)
Con 20 (+15)		Dex 28 (+19)
Int 18 (+14)		Wis 17 (+13)
Cha 23 (+16)
Languages Abyssal, Elven
Alignment Evil
Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 23

Equipment eye patch of discernment (+5 Insight and Perception), handy holding hat (acts as a handy haversack), cape of the mountebank +4 , dagger x4, rapier .
